statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE likes_count > 100
SELECT user_id, comments_count FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT post_date, likes_count FROM social_media_data ORDER BY likes_count DESC
SELECT user_id, post_content, comments_count FROM social_media_data WHERE comments_count < 10
SELECT user_id, post_content, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE comments_count < 10 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, post_content, post_date, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_data WHERE post_content LIKE '%beautiful%' ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_content, post_date, likes_count FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY post_date ASC, likes_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, comments_count FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id IN (1, 5, 10) AND likes_count > 50 ORDER BY comments_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, name, tweet_text FROM customers JOIN tweets ON customers.customer_id = tweets.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, likes, retweets FROM tweets JOIN customers ON tweets.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT customer_id, email, sentiment FROM customers JOIN tweets ON customers.customer_id = tweets.customer_id WHERE sentiment = 'Positive';
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN tweets ON customers.customer_id = tweets.customer_id WHERE tweets.likes > 100 ORDER BY customers.name ASC
SELECT name, email, COUNT(tweet_id) AS total_tweets FROM customers LEFT JOIN tweets ON customers.customer_id = tweets.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING total_tweets > 5

SELECT name, email, tweet_text, likes, retweets, sentiment FROM customers INNER JOIN tweets ON customers.customer_id = tweets.customer_id WHERE sentiment = 'Positive' ORDER BY tweets.likes DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT customer_id, name, email, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM customers INNER JOIN tweets ON customers.customer_id = tweets.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING total_likes > 500 ORDER BY total_likes DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, sentiment_score FROM customers c JOIN sentiment_analysis s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_price, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, sentiment_score FROM customers JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customers.customer_id = sentiment_analysis.customer_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, sentiment_score FROM customers JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customers.customer_id = sentiment_analysis.customer_id JOIN products ON sentiment_analysis.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT name, age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, location FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, num_likes, num_comments FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE num_likes > num_comments ORDER BY num_likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT review_id, rating, comment FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_label FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 3;

SELECT reviews.customer_id, products.product_name, reviews.rating, reviews.comment FROM reviews JOIN products ON reviews.product_id = products.product_id WHERE reviews.rating >= 4 ORDER BY reviews.rating DESC, products.product_name ASC;
